parameters: "Suelle!! I've found out where Selphie is!!"

"Yes, following the leads on human trafficking from the
information Nolz provided... I finally met someone who knows
about Selphie."

"Honestly, because we had to conduct a covert investigation
to avoid alerting the enemy, it took quite some time."

"But now, we can finally rescue Selphie, right? So, where is
she now?"

"A prison facility? That's where criminals are isolated
without any chance for visitation or information getting
out, right?"

"Exactly, that place. And the person who has Selphie locked
up is..."

Rise: "It's true. And it's not just Selphie. It seems
Gugukas has been capturing women he takes a liking to and
playing with them in that prison facility."

"But how come no one noticed Gugukas's misdeeds, even though
he's the head of the Ministry of Justice?"

"It seems that he arranged for his own people to be placed
in positions within the facility, people who would do as he
pleased."

"After the Demon Lord was defeated, the mercenaries who were
defending the stronghold were massively laid off. There were
people who couldn't make ends meet."

"Gugukas targeted those people, hiring those among them who
would turn a blind eye to his misdeeds for money."

"No one could have predicted that things would turn out like
this."
"Now, that place has become Gugukas's personal playground."

"Unforgivable. Not only did he deceive us, but he even took
Selphie-san."

"But we've got a lead on Gugukas's tail. We'll definitely
catch him and take back Selphie!!"
"Of course!! I'll beat him to a pulp!!"

Suelle (Wait for me, Selphie. I'll come to save you right
away.)

The destination \C[2]Prison Facility\C[0] has been added to
the map.
